data.title: movie about a baby that drinks blood
data.meta_description: I saw this movie about 5 years ago on either HBO or Showtime. I believe it is an American movie.  A woman is pregnant and she and her husband get in a car accident. The man dies but the wife surviv...
data.text: I saw this movie about 5 years ago on either HBO or Showtime. I believe it is an American movie. A woman is pregnant and she and her husband get in a car accident. The man dies but the wife survives and is told her child is dead and will be stillborn. The child is delivered, is alive, but only wants blood to drink. The only other thing I remember is the child breastfeeding and there being a lot of blood from it. Sorry, that is all I remember.
